verses.verse: After <S%G3326><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things Jesus <S%G2424><s%> showed <S%G5319><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to the disciples <S%G3101><s%> at <S%G1909><s%> the sea <S%G2281><s%> of Tiberias; <S%G5085><s%> and on this <S%G3779><s%> wise showed <S%G5319><s%> he himself.

There were together <S%G3674><s%> Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> and Thomas <S%G2381><s%> called <S%G3004><s%> Didymus, <S%G1324><s%> and Nathanael <S%G3482><s%> of Cana <S%G2580><s%> in Galilee, <S%G1056><s%> and the sons of Zebedee, <S%G2199><s%> and two <S%G1417><s%> other <S%G243><s%> of his disciples. <S%G3101><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, I go <S%G5217><s%> a fishing. <S%G232><s%> They say <S%G3004><s%> to him, We also <S%G2532><s%> go <S%G2064><s%> with you. They went <S%G1831><s%> forth, <S%G1831><s%> and entered <S%G305><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> a ship <S%G4143><s%> immediately; <S%G2117><s%> and that night <S%G3571><s%> they caught <S%G4084><s%> nothing. <S%G3762><s%>

But when the morning <S%G4405><s%> was now <S%G2235><s%> come, <S%G1096><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> stood <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the shore: <S%G123><s%> but the disciples <S%G3101><s%> knew <S%G1492><s%> not that it was Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>

Then <S%G3767><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Children, <S%G3813><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> you any <S%G3387><s%> meat? <S%G4371><s%> They answered <S%G611><s%> him, No. <S%G3756><s%>

And he said <S%G2036><s%> to them, Cast <S%G906><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> on <S%G1519><s%> the right <S%G1188><s%> side <S%G3313><s%> of the ship, <S%G4143><s%> and you shall find. <S%G2147><s%> They cast <S%G906><s%> therefore, <S%G3767><s%> and now <S%G3765><s%> they were not able <S%G2480><s%> to draw <S%G1670><s%> it for the multitude <S%G4128><s%> of fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> that disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Peter, <S%G4074><s%> It is the Lord. <S%G2962><s%> Now <S%G3767><s%> when Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> heard <S%G191><s%> that it was the Lord, <S%G2962><s%> he girt <S%G1241><s%> his fisher's <S%G1903><s%> coat <S%G1903><s%> to him, (for he was naked, <S%G1131><s%>) and did cast <S%G906><s%> himself <S%G1438><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the sea. <S%G2281><s%>

And the other <S%G243><s%> disciples <S%G3101><s%> came <S%G2064><s%> in a little <S%G4142><s%> ship; <S%G4142><s%> (for they were not far <S%G3112><s%> from land, <S%G1093><s%> but as it were two <S%G1250><s%> hundred <S%G1250><s%> cubits, <S%G4083><s%>) dragging <S%G4951><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> with fishes. <S%G2486><s%>

As soon then <S%G3767><s%> as they were come <S%G576><s%> to land, <S%G1093><s%> they saw <S%G991><s%> a fire of coals <S%G439><s%> there, and fish <S%G3795><s%> laid <S%G1945><s%> thereon, <S%G1945><s%> and bread. <S%G740><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Bring <S%G5342><s%> of the fish <S%G3795><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> you have now <S%G3568><s%> caught. <S%G4084><s%>

Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> went <S%G305><s%> up, and drew <S%G1670><s%> the net <S%G1350><s%> to land <S%G1093><s%> full <S%G3324><s%> of great <S%G3173><s%> fishes, <S%G2486><s%> an hundred <S%G1540><s%> and fifty <S%G4004><s%> and three: <S%G5140><s%> and for all there were so <S%G5118><s%> many, <S%G5118><s%> yet was not the net <S%G1350><s%> broken. <S%G4977><s%>

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to them, Come <S%G1205><s%> and dine. <S%G709><s%> And none <S%G3762><s%> of the disciples <S%G3101><s%> dared <S%G5111><s%> ask <S%G1833><s%> him, Who <S%G5101><s%> are <S%G1488><s%> you? knowing <S%G1492><s%> that it was the Lord. <S%G2962><s%>
Jesus <S%G2424><s%> then <S%G3767><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> and takes <S%G2983><s%> bread, <S%G740><s%> and gives <S%G1325><s%> them, and fish <S%G3795><s%> likewise. <S%G3668><s%>

This <S%G5124><s%> is now <S%G2235><s%> the third <S%G5154><s%> time that Jesus <S%G2424><s%> showed <S%G5319><s%> himself to his disciples, <S%G3101><s%> after that he was risen <S%G1453><s%> from the dead. <S%G3498><s%>

So <S%G3767><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> they had dined, <S%G709><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to Simon <S%G4613><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jonas, <S%G2495><s%> love <S%G25><s%> you me more <S%G4119><s%> than these? <S%G5130><s%> He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> you know <S%G1492><s%> that I love <S%G5368><s%> you. He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Feed <S%G1006><s%> my lambs. <S%G721><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him again <S%G3825><s%> the second <S%G1208><s%> time, Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jonas, <S%G2495><s%> love <S%G25><s%> you me? He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Yes, <S%G3483><s%> Lord; <S%G2962><s%> you know <S%G1492><s%> that I love <S%G5368><s%> you. He said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Feed <S%G4165><s%> my sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> to him the third <S%G5154><s%> time, Simon, <S%G4613><s%> son of Jonas, <S%G2495><s%> love <S%G5368><s%> you me? Peter <S%G4074><s%> was grieved <S%G3076><s%> because <S%G3754><s%> he said <S%G2036><s%> to him the third <S%G5154><s%> time, Love <S%G5368><s%> you me? And he said <S%G2036><s%> to him, Lord, <S%G2962><s%> you know <S%G1492><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> things; you know <S%G1097><s%> that I love <S%G5368><s%> you. Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Feed <S%G1006><s%> my sheep. <S%G4263><s%>

Truly, <S%G281><s%> truly, <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, When <S%G3753><s%> you were <S%G2258><s%> young, <S%G3501><s%> you gird <S%G2224><s%> yourself, <S%G4572><s%> and walked <S%G4043><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> you would: <S%G2309><s%> but when <S%G3752><s%> you shall be old, <S%G1095><s%> you shall stretch <S%G1614><s%> forth <S%G1614><s%> your hands, <S%G5495><s%> and another <S%G243><s%> shall gird <S%G2224><s%> you, and carry <S%G5342><s%> you where <S%G3699><s%> you would <S%G2309><s%> not.

This <S%G5124><s%> spoke <S%G2036><s%> he, signifying <S%G4591><s%> by what <S%G4169><s%> death <S%G2288><s%> he should glorify <S%G1392><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%> And when he had spoken <S%G2036><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> he said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Follow <S%G190><s%> me.

Then <S%G1161><s%> Peter, <S%G4074><s%> turning <S%G1994><s%> about, <S%G1994><s%> sees <S%G991><s%> the disciple <S%G3101><s%> whom <S%G3739><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> loved <S%G25><s%> following; <S%G190><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> leaned <S%G377><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his breast <S%G4738><s%> at <S%G1722><s%> supper, <S%G1173><s%> and said, <S%G2036><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> which <S%G5101><s%> is he that betrays <S%G3860><s%> you?
Peter <S%G4074><s%> seeing <S%G1492><s%> him said <S%G3004><s%> to Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> Lord, <S%G2962><s%> and what <S%G5101><s%> shall this <S%G3778><s%> man do?

Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, If <S%G1437><s%> I will <S%G2309><s%> that he tarry <S%G3306><s%> till <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to you? follow <S%G190><s%> you me.

Then <S%G3767><s%> went <S%G1831><s%> this <S%G3778><s%> saying <S%G3056><s%> abroad <S%G1831><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> the brothers, <S%G80><s%> that that disciple <S%G3101><s%> should not die: <S%G599><s%> yet <S%G2532><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> not to him, He shall not die; <S%G599><s%> but, If <S%G1437><s%> I will that he tarry till <S%G2193><s%> I come, <S%G2064><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> is that to you?

This <S%G3778><s%> is the disciple <S%G3101><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> testifies <S%G3140><s%> of these <S%G5130><s%> things, and wrote <S%G1125><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things: and we know <S%G1492><s%> that his testimony <S%G3141><s%> is true. <S%G227><s%>

And there are also <S%G2532><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> other <S%G243><s%> things which <S%G3745><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> did, <S%G4160><s%> the which, <S%G3748><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> they should be written <S%G1125><s%> every <S%G2596><s%> one, <S%G1520><s%> I suppose <S%G3633><s%> that even <S%G3761><s%> the world <S%G2889><s%> itself <S%G846><s%> could not contain <S%G5562><s%> the books <S%G975><s%> that should be written. <S%G1125><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
